intro: Echeveria patriotica, commonly known as the Patriot Echeveria, is a species of flowering plant in the Crassulaceae family. It is native to the arid regions of Mexico and is characterized by its compact, rosette-forming structure. The leaves are thick, fleshy, and covered in a dense layer of white to silver hairs, which help reduce water loss. It produces vibrant, star-shaped flowers in shades of red, pink, and orange during the spring and summer months. This plant is well-suited for rock gardens and xeriscaping due to its drought tolerance and low maintenance requirements.
